properties.entry: SELECT P_CODE , CATEGORY_NO , P_NAME , PRICE , PUBLISH_MONTH , IMAGE_URL1 FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 10 ORDER BY PUBLISH_MONTH DESC
SELECT P_CODE , CATEGORY_NO , P_NAME , PRICE , PUBLISH_MONTH , IMAGE_URL1 FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 10 ORDER BY PUBLISH_MONTH ASC

SELECT P_CODE , P_NAME , PRICE , PUBLISHER , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM PUBLISH_MONTH)"MONTH" , P_STOCK , SUP_YN , IMAGE_URL1 , IMAGE_URL2 , S.IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT left JOIN SUPPLEMENT S USING(P_CODE) WHERE P_CODE = ?
SELECT Q_NO , Q_YN , TITLE , M.MEM_NAME , I.ENROLL_DATE FROM INQUIRY I JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEM_NO) WHERE P_CODE = ? ORDER BY I.ENROLL_DATE
